headline: How Hard Can It Be to Choose a Hardwood Floor?
abstract: Harder than you might think, given all the options available. Here’s how to navigate the various decisions you’ll have to make.
lead_paragraph: If you have flooring you don’t like — whether it’s carpet, vinyl or unappealing wood — it can feel like there’s no way to escape it, no matter how many rugs you pile on top. But if you have floors you love, walking across them can be a daily pleasure.
